channel.title: Chromebooks
channel.description:
Anybody got one yet? Are they any good? Just from looking at the specs on BestBuy they look hideous...what was Google thinking.
Not a single one of them has dedicated video memory and not a single one of them has 1900x resolution yet.

item.title: Chromebooks
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:20, topic:522974”]I hate the idea of just getting browser extensions and calling them “apps”.[/quote]I’m pretty sure they’re locally installed web applications (at least some of them are locally installed).

item.title: Chromebooks
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:14, topic:522974”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=641466.msg4321475#msg4321475 date=1372267185]

[quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=641466.msg4321470#msg4321470 date=1372267007]

It’s all about Mozilla Firefox, Jmood.

I should really change, but I’ve a bit of a Stockholm syndrome with Opera. I hate it for many things, but I can’t leave it.
[/quote]never tried opera I hear it’s similar to firefox

[hr]

It’s all about Mozilla Firefox, Jmood.

I should really change, but I’ve a bit of a Stockholm syndrome with Opera. I hate it for many things, but I can’t leave it.

I switch off from FF and Chrome.
[/quote]chrome for gaming online , ff for "movies’

freak[/quote]tyty I do try. ;D

Read full topic

god that sounds annoying

item.title: Chromebooks
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

I think they are targeting people who are in school and need a simple, cheap yet somewhat decent laptop.

Read full topic

item.title: Chromebooks
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:5, topic:522974”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=641466.msg4321438#msg4321438 date=1372265932]
Not worth it. Check out Ultrabooks, they’re pretty cool.
[/quote]Not planning on buying a laptop of any kind I was just curious what the chrome os is like.

[hr]

[quote author=Muroth link=topic=641466.msg4321445#msg4321445 date=1372266079]
The Chromebook Pixel has a 2560 x 1700 resolution.

Google Chromebooks

Google Chromebooks

The Chromebook is a new, faster computer. It starts in seconds, and offers thousands of apps. It has built-in virus protection, and backs up your stuff in the cloud. With automatic updates, it keeps getting better.

The Chromebook is meant for simple things, not for heavy gaming, so it doesn’t need a lot of video memory other than to stream videos and play minigames. I do agree that it is a waste of money.
[/quote]I don’t see how Google is planning on profiting from a laptop that is pure crap[/quote]

Do you use Chrome as your web browser?

Read full topic

The Chromebook is a new, faster computer. It starts in seconds, and offers thousands of apps. It has built-in virus protection, and backs up your stuff in the cloud. With automatic updates, it keeps getting better.

The Chromebook is meant for simple things, not for heavy gaming, so it doesn’t need a lot of video memory other than to stream videos and play minigames. I do agree that it is a waste of money.[/quote]I don’t see how Google is planning on profiting from a laptop that is pure crap
